success.reason: The assistant located the order placed on 2025-10-28 for the Coffee Maker using the provided email and last4 digits, confirmed cancellation eligibility, and successfully canceled the order early in the conversation (Turn 2). role_confusion.reason: The user consistently acted as a user requesting help and providing information about their own order. There were no instances of the user asking questions to assist the assistant, offering help to the assistant, or confirming details on behalf of the assistant.
